detectors.description:
HYIP () contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- m_investors.push(Investor(msg.sender,msg.value,now)) ()
detectors.markdown:
[HYIP]() contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [m_investors.push(Investor(msg.sender,msg.value,now))]()

detectors.description: HYIP.performPayouts().investorsPayout () is a local variable never initialized
detectors.markdown: [HYIP.performPayouts().investorsPayout]() is a local variable never initialized

detectors.description:
HYIP.changeAdmin(address) () should emit an event for: 
	- m_admin = newAdmin ()
detectors.markdown:
[HYIP.changeAdmin(address)]() should emit an event for: 
	- [m_admin = newAdmin]()

detectors.description:
HYIP.changeAdmin(address).newAdmin () lacks a zero-check on :
		- m_admin = newAdmin ()
Modifier HYIP.adminOnly() () does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [HYIP.adminOnly()]() does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description: HYIP.performPayouts() () has external calls inside a loop: ! m_beneficiaries[idx].send(eachBeneficiaryPayout) ()
detectors.markdown: [HYIP.performPayouts()]() has external calls inside a loop: [! m_beneficiaries[idx].send(eachBeneficiaryPayout)]()

detectors.description: HYIP.performPayouts() () has external calls inside a loop: ! m_investors[idx].etherAddress.send(payout) ()
detectors.markdown: [HYIP.performPayouts()]() has external calls inside a loop: [! m_investors[idx].etherAddress.send(payout)]()

detectors.description:
HYIP.performPayouts() () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- m_latestPaidTime + PAYOUT_INTERVAL < now ()
	- idx < m_beneficiaries.length ()
	- idx -- > 0 ()
	- m_investors[idx].investmentTime > m_latestPaidTime + PAYOUT_INTERVAL ()
detectors.markdown:
[HYIP.performPayouts()]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [m_latestPaidTime + PAYOUT_INTERVAL < now]()
	- [idx < m_beneficiaries.length]()
	- [idx -- > 0]()
	- [m_investors[idx].investmentTime > m_latestPaidTime + PAYOUT_INTERVAL]()

detectors.description:
HYIP.performPayouts() () has costly operations inside a loop:
	- m_latestPaidTime += PAYOUT_INTERVAL ()
detectors.markdown:
[HYIP.performPayouts()]() has costly operations inside a loop:
	- [m_latestPaidTime += PAYOUT_INTERVAL]()

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected THROW ():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [THROW]():
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.4.2 () allows old versions
solc-0.4.2 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.4.2 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Variable HYIP.INTEREST_DENOMINATOR () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.m_latestPaidTime () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.m_beneficiaries () is not in mixedCase
Function HYIP.Invest() () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.BENEFICIARIES_INTEREST () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.PAYOUT_INTERVAL () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.INVESTORS_INTEREST () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.m_investors () is not in mixedCase
Variable HYIP.m_admin () is not in mixedCase

Reentrancy in HYIP.performPayouts() ():
	External calls:
	- ! m_beneficiaries[idx].send(eachBeneficiaryPayout) ()
	- ! m_investors[idx].etherAddress.send(payout) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_latestPaidTime += PAYOUT_INTERVAL ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Payout(paidPeriods,investorsPayout,beneficiariesPayout) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [HYIP.performPayouts()]():
	External calls:
	- [! m_beneficiaries[idx].send(eachBeneficiaryPayout)]()
	- [! m_investors[idx].etherAddress.send(payout)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [m_latestPaidTime += PAYOUT_INTERVAL]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [Payout(paidPeriods,investorsPayout,beneficiariesPayout)]()

detectors.description: Loop condition idx < m_beneficiaries.length () should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
detectors.markdown: Loop condition [idx < m_beneficiaries.length]() should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.

detectors.description: HYIP.PAYOUT_INTERVAL () should be constant
HYIP.INTEREST_DENOMINATOR () should be constant
HYIP.INVESTORS_INTEREST () should be constant
HYIP.BENEFICIARIES_INTEREST () should be constant
